Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the retirement of deputy sheriffs-civil in the county of Monroe
Summary: Relates to the retirement of deputy sheriffs-civil in the county of Monroe.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the retirement of deputy sheriffs-civil in the county of Monroe
